survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients about their satisfaction with healthcare providers, including doctors, nurses, and administrative staff.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall experience with your healthcare provider?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall experience with your healthcare provider?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following services did you receive during your visit? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option for additional services.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following services did you receive during your visit? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the waiting time before seeing your healthcare provider?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction with waiting times.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the waiting time before seeing your healthcare provider?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the communication skills of your healthcare provider?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure communication effectiveness.

script.question_text: How would you rate the communication skills of your healthcare provider?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Did your healthcare provider explain your diagnosis and treatment options in a way you could understand?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale for clarity of explanation.

script.question_text: Did your healthcare provider explain your diagnosis and treatment options in a way you could understand?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness and hygiene of the healthcare facility?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction with cleanliness.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness and hygiene of the healthcare facility?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Were your concerns and questions addressed to your satisfaction?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale for satisfaction with addressing concerns.

script.question_text: Were your concerns and questions addressed to your satisfaction?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who answered Q1.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of the administrative staff?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure staff interaction.

script.question_text: How would you rate the friendliness and professionalism of the administrative staff?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this healthcare provider to a friend or family member?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this healthcare provider to a friend or family member?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving the healthcare services.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended feedback for qualitative insights.
